body:
I recently started trying bitcoin core as my bitcoin wallet. I transferred a few mBTC and completed a successful backup and restore test of the wallet.dat. Everything was working fine for a couple of hours and then Bitcoin-QT crashed with a fatal error. Upon restart my wallet appeared completely empty. 

I'm running OS X Yosemite 10.10.2 and Bitcoin core v0.10.0

Since I had a backup, I'm fine. However from what I see in the debug.log file is pretty concerning. Would this have been recoverable if I didn't have a backup?
